comment.text: Catalyzes the NADPH-dependent reduction of a wide variety of carbonyl-containing compounds to their corresponding alcohols with a broad range of catalytic efficiencies.
Cys-299 may regulate the kinetic and inhibition properties of the enzyme, but does not participate in catalysis.
Highly expressed in embryonic epithelial cells (EUE) in response to osmotic stress.
Belongs to the aldo/keto reductase family.

feature.description: Lowers pKa of active site Tyr
